price: Não te iluda, Muhammad, a prosperidade nas terras dos que renegam a Fé.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
